quote: History is written by the victors.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Those who cannot remember the past are condemned to repeat it.
author: George Santayana

quote: The more you know about the past, the better prepared you are for the future.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: History is not a burden on the memory but an illumination of the soul.
author: Lord Acton

quote: The only thing new in the world is the history you do not know.
author: Harry S. Truman

quote: History will be kind to me for I intend to write it.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: We are not makers of history. We are made by history.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: History teaches that those who hold their hands out to help others usually help themselves.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: To understand the world, you must first understand a place like New York.
author: Margaret Mead

quote: In history, nothing happens for the first time.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: The past is never dead. It's not even past.
author: William Faulkner

quote: The great use of life is to spend it for something that will outlast it.
author: William James
